mapper.update: update product set discount=#{discount}, quantity=#{quantity}, sold=#{sold}, remain=#{quantity}-#{sold} where product_id=#{productId} and size_id=#{sizeId} and color_id=#{colorId}
update product set status=1 where product_id=#{productId}
update product set status=1 where product_id=#{productId} and size_id=#{sizeId} and color_id=#{colorId}
mapper.insert: insert into product( "product_id", "name", "description", "rate", "material", "category_id", "price", "quantity", "sold", "remain", "color_id", "size_id", "image", "discount", "created_at", "updated_at" ) values( #{productId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{rate}, #{material}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{quantity}, 0, #{quantity}, #{colorId}, #{sizeId}, #{image}, 0, Now(), Now() )
mapper.select: Select product_id, name, description, sum(quantity) as quantity, SUM(sold) as sold, sum(remain) as remain, price, COUNT(*) AS totalRecords from product where status=0 group by product_id, name, description, price
select count(*) from product where status=0

SELECT p.product_id,p.name, p.color_id, p.size_id, p.price, p.description, p.rate, p.material, p.quantity , p.sold ,p.remain, p.discount , c."name" as color , s.name as size, p.image, cg.name as category FROM product p JOIN color c ON p.color_id = c.id join size s on p.size_id = s.id join category cg on p.category_id = cg.id WHERE (p.name = #{name} or p.product_id = #{productId}) and status!=1

SELECT p.product_id,p.name, p.price, p.description, p.rate, p.material, p.quantity , p.sold ,p.remain , c."name" as color , s.name as size, p.image, cg.name as category FROM product p JOIN color c ON p.color_id = c.id join size s on p.size_id = s.id join category cg on p.category_id = cg.id WHERE p.product_id = #{productId} and p.color_id=#{colorId} and p.size_id = #{sizeId} limit 1
